thread.title: BRIEF-Armstrong World Industries Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.92

title: BRIEF-Armstrong World Industries Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.92
text: February 26, 2018 / 12:27 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Armstrong World Industries Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.92 Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Armstrong World Industries Inc: * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.92 * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES QTRLY REPORTED NET SALES $214.3 MILLION, UP 9 PERCENT * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES SEES 2018 NET SALES GROWTH OF 5-7 PERCENT * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES SEES DOUBLE DIGIT EBITDA GROWTH IN 2018 * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES SEES ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW GROWTH OF 20-30 PERCENT IN 2018 * ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.67, REVENUE VIEW $214.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $938.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
